Description: Navigating a successful career in cancer research, whether in academia, industry or government, can be daunting.  Establishing a team of mentors to guide you along the way is an essential step as you begin your journey. This session features cancer researchers with a strong commitment to mentoring and supporting the professional development of cancer research investigators. Hear their stories and learn how to build and take full advantage of an effective mentoring team, whether you are a trainee, and early-stage investigator or a later stage investigator considering a career change.
SearchResultBody: PAS06. Building an Effective Mentorship Team: Essential Strategies at Every Stage in Your Career
Title: Building an Effective Mentorship Team: Essential Strategies at Every Stage in Your Career
